item.title: GeoCAT-examples
item.description: A collection of GeoCAT example Python scripts that demonstrate how to use GeoCATâ€™s computational functions, or how to plot geoscientific data via packages in the Python ecosystem (primarily, Matplotlib and Cartopy), similar or identical to the plots on the NCL examples website.
